title: Pedagogy and Learning Apprenticeship
description: Under the supervision of an instructor, undergraduate students gain teaching experience through practical experiences in course management and effective teaching methods. Limited to upper-division students with a 3.0 GPA or higher. Students must apply the quarter preceding the quarter in which the BISP 195P will be completed. Applications are reviewed by instructors via the online system and assignments are made based on school need. P/NP grades only. May be taken for credit one time. Prerequisites: school approval required and upper-division standing.
